Address: Lot 418 Howard Street St Leonards VIC 3223
Description:
Seachange Estate Lot 418 Howard Street Corner Block
This lovely titled block in Seachange Estate is one of a limited number of corner blocks in stage 8, located on the corner of Howard Street & Kane Drive.
Seachange has two magnificent palm tree lined entries with over 7 acres of landscaped wetlands. Large ornamental trees line this beautiful street. This lot has north facing backyard for lovely winter sun and a generous lot depth of 32m.
Seachange Estate offers the spoils of a coastal lifestyle with the convenience of landscaped wetlands, reserves and walking tracks. Enjoy a leisurely morning walk along the foreshore or wander down to the town centre for a coffee and a catch-up with friends.
The latest extension to the beautiful Seachange Estate at St. Leonards is located close to the beach. With lots ranging from 300sqm to over 720sqm and with frontages from 10m to 20m (and everything in between) there really is something to suit everyone's lifestyle and budget.
The quality of the previous stages is available for all to see with the landscaping themes to be continued into the next stages. Of note will be the palm tree lined dual carriage way entry boulevard off the new Leviens Road main entry as well as acres of wetland reserves at the front entry available for passive recreation.
The lot on offer is Lot 418 Howard Street approx. 321m2
Width: Approx. 13m
Depth: Approx. 25m
Less than 90 minutes from Melbourne and 30 minutes from Geelong 'Seachange' represents outstanding value for money and is no doubt why it is selling so quickly.
Contact Trevor McManus on 0448 810 074 for more information.

Description:
Breathtaking
Due to the existing restrictions and overwhelming interest from our Melbourne buyers, the Expressions of Interest Campaign for this breathtaking home has been extended to Monday 21st September at 5:00pm (Unless Sold Prior).
This stunning modernist style home is a dream come true: a calm, peaceful and private oasis away from the world. Truly a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to escape the pressures of the city, while maintaining an easy commute to Docklands via the trendy Portarlington Ferry.
Moving seamlessly between indoors and out, this remarkable architect-designed paradise is filled with light, feeling open and spacious, yet blissfully secluded. Stroll to the sandy shores of Half Moon Bay for an early morning walk or swim then rinse off under the outdoor shower and retreat for the day by your very own natural pool.
Enjoy the north facing sunshine on a sunny winters day or curl up with a book and be embraced by the warmth of the Cheminees Phillippe wood-burning fireplace and hydronic heating, feeling safe and snug even during the wildest of days.
No expense has been spared to create this 1.56 acres of paradise. Whether you work from home, or like to work-out at home, the separate studio space is private and quiet, separate from the main house and overlooking the pool.
But that's not all! There's also a stylish self-contained cottage, perfect for hosting guests, or as an independent living space for grandparents or teenagers, or for tapping into the lucrative B&B market.
Its time to embrace the life you always dreamed of, youll never want to leave. Contact our agents today for an inspection.
Key Features;
Architect-designed masterpiece just over 200 metres from the beach
Cheminees Philippe wood-burning fireplace & hydronic heating
Hardwood floors, architectural lighting and bespoke detailing
Galley-style kitchen, solid timber/Corian benchtops & Miele appliances
Self-contained 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom cottage plus separate home office/gym
Natural 12.5m solar heated swimming pool and entertaining pavilion
Eco-friendly passive design, solar panels, water tanks & low-e glass
Native landscaped gardens and flourishing organic potager garden
Privately positioned on a secure 1.56 acres (approx.) allotment with front & rear access

Description:
Spacious, Sunny and Great Location
This four bedroom home is designed to cater for a contemporary lifestyle where spacious and sunny indoor and outdoor living is essential. It has a floor plan to suit families or anyone who loves to host guests.
A few of the features here include a generous master suite with en-suite and walk-in robe. The open plan living zone is the focal point of the home and it features a well-planned kitchen with an oversize walk in pantry, quality appliances and a breakfast bar, which all makes it easy to entertain the crowds. The adjacent family and meals area both enjoy effortless access to outdoor living. Choose from a covered north facing patio or west facing hardwood deck complete with ceiling fan and cafe blinds. A second living area is ideal as a media room or as a parents quiet retreat.
Three additional bedrooms have built in robes and share a family sized bathroom with separate bath and shower. A laundry with ample storage; and a double lock up garage with roll through access to the rear are also included. The superbly landscaped 512m² (approx) allotment is fenced and easy care and comes with a handy garden shed.
Located in a peaceful pocket, this property is ideally placed for quick access to shops and the local primary school. Harbourside boating and fishing as well as ocean beaches are nearby, as are the nature filled reserves and world class wineries that the Bellarine is famous for. Impressively maintained, this is a smart solution for modern living.

Description:
Neat as a Pin Package
Light & bright just 12 months young this contemporary 4 bedroom Simmonds home offers direct access to the popular Bellarine rail trail. Master bedroom has street views, walk in robe & full en-suite. First living is perfect as a parents retreat or formal lounge with yard views. Flowing on is the family hub with an open plan kitchen & dining zone, double cupboard pantry, stainless steel appliances that include a 900mm electronic oven & gas 5 burner cook top with range hood plus dishwasher. Tiled dining has sliding doors out to the patio area making entertaining a breeze. 2nd spacious family living also has sliding doors out to the backyard. Bedrooms 2, 3 & 4 all have built in robes off a divided hallway for privacy. Also here is a central bathroom with a deep bath & separate shower. Double linen off the laundry. Additional features are gas ducted heating, reverse cycle split system, solar hot water, led down lights plus a double lock up garage with internal access. Lovely low maintenance gardens on a 448m2 block giving enough room for kids & pets to play. Don't build - the hard work has been done so all you have to do is just purchase, pack then move & enjoy the Bellarine lifestyle today. An absolute must on your house hunting list.

Description:
Stylish Modern Living
Looking to settle in one of most sought after locations on the Bellarine Peninsula, namely Portarlington?
New to the market is this beautifully stylish home, recently fully renovated with care, love and style. Located within a short stroll of the main Portarlington shopping strip, beach and safe harbour and just a stones throw from the Portarlington golf club, this home abounds with stunning features.
Outdoors is the generous front yard made private with the high fences and plenty of room for the fishing boat or van, double garage for the vehicles and storage. The wide and spacious decking leads up to the house allowing for BBQing or entertaining in style.
Inside is nothing short of special, the bottom level is featured with Blackbutt flooring, timber benchtops, pleasing neutral tones, open plan dining and living area's all opening to the deck where indoor-outdoor lifestyle is the norm. Master bedroom with ensuite including spa bath, is also on this level making single level living optional and easy.
Follow the again featured Blackbutt staircase and painted timber lined walls to the upper level of the home and you are greeted by another spacious living area complemented by the timber lined ceilings, three bedrooms and modern renovated bathroom. All bathed in natural light with large windows covered by modern block out blinds.
To the rear is a private courtyard, protected from the southwest breeze.
All in all, this home is a gem for those of us who seek the simple lifestyles of the Bellarine, don't want to lift a finger, want to be close to all, but far enough away and wish to live in a stylish fully renovated sophisticated home. This is it and should not be passed over for a visit.

Description:
732m2 Block and Only Minutes to the Beach!
Tucked away behind the main street of St. Leonards, where all amenities, cafes, public transport, primary school, the Pier, and the beach are only a short stroll away, location here can't be beaten!

Neat as a pin and located in a secure court locale, Bay side living has never looked so good. With manicured gardens both front and back, there isn't anything to do but put your feet up and enjoy! Upon entry, you're welcomed by the master bedroom with walk-in-robe and full ensuite; the perfect parents retreat! The expansive and sun filled open living area offers a fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, gas cooking, dishwasher, and walk-in-pantry, which overlooks the dining and living space. The rear wing is home to a further 2 bedrooms with built-in-robes and 2nd living, which are serviced by a central family bathroom, separate toilet and laundry.
Everything you want for either a family home or ideal holiday home, the back garden is low maintenance and offers 2 separate undercover entertaining areas and a lush open grassed space, with room for all to enjoy. The cherry on top of this St. Leonards cake, is the wide side access which allows a plethora of space for multiple cars, the boat, caravan or even potential to erect further garaging (STCA).
Additional features include, ducted heating, solar panels, NBN ready and oversized garden shed with power.
With St. Leonards seeing phenomenal growth and no sign of slowing down, get in quick and secure your slice today.

Description:
A STUNNING OPPORTUNITY TO BUILD YOUR DREAM!
This is your opportunity to secure a prime allotment of approx 585m2 in a sought after position in Clifton Springs surrounded by established quality homes. This fantastic site features a gentle elevation of the land allowing for spectacular bay views stretching from the You Yangs to the Geelong skyline. Enjoy an easy walk to the Clifton Springs bowling club, golf club, the stunning swimming beach at the Dell and a 2 minute drive to the popular and recently upgraded Clifton Springs boat ramp. Live life in style by the sea with everything the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer on your door step including award winning wineries, restaurants, schools, shops and medical centres. You will also enjoy easy access to Geelong or take the ferry from Portarlington to Melbourne. This is one not to be missed!!!

Description:
Enticing Charm With Exciting Possibilities!
Instantly appealing, 3 Wanawong Court offers a wonderful opportunity for first home buyers, downsizers or renovators with an eye for the future to see the unlimited possibilities this property has to offer. Classic in design this home offers a clean, blank palette to create the ultimate family home or solid investment opportunity. Featuring a classic floorplan design, complemented by 3 bedrooms with built in robes and a spacious formal lounge/dining area which gives a wonderful sense of space. The practical kitchen is offset by a large living room which leads to the low maintenance private backyard. What sets this property apart from the majority of the residential homes in Clifton Springs is the ability to park your boat or caravan off the street. Undeniably, the location is highly sought after being closely located to all the lifestyle pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for, a short stroll to public transport, excellent array of the area's finest schools, public or private, multiple choice of shopping centres close by & access to the Bellarine Peninsula's world class restaurants & wineries. An inspection is a must to fully appreciate this beautiful home.

Description:
Lifestyle of Envy
Tribeca built two storey 4 bedroom family home offers you the pinnacle of low maintenance living without compromising on quality just 3 years young. Lovely low maintenance gardens lead you to the front door as you enter inside to the first lounge area which is light filled with street views. Down the hall is the vast open planning living zone perfect as the family hub with a dining area and a 2nd living area both with sliding doors out to the undercover patio making entertaining a breeze. Modern kitchen features stone benches, a plethora of cupboards, huge walk in pantry with stainless steel appliances including a gas 5 burner cook top, 900mm oven, range hood and dish washer. Also on the ground floor is a powder room, a giant laundry solving more storage needs with a walk in linen. You also have internal access from the double lock up garage. Take the stairs up to the second storey where everyone can sleep tight on the same level, no segregation worries here with the kids downstairs. Master bedroom will be sure to impress you as it is super-sized with its own built in parents retreat & private balcony with ever changing bay views. Also here is a walk in robe, a large ensuite that has his & hers vanities, double sized shower and hidden toilet. Bedroom 2 is bigger likewise with bay views which could be used as a 3rd living or study with built in robes. Bedrooms 3 & 4 are identical twins, same size with built in robes. Central stylish bathroom services this area with a separate powder room. Additional features include neutral tones throughout for a calm & coastal vibe, LED down lights, gas ducted heating, reverse cycle split system, solar hot water service, off street parking, side gates & all on a fantastic block size of 508m2. Surrounded by an array of premium homes this amazing residence is only a stroll to the shops or the bay. Just a short drive to everything the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer such as the rail trail, boat ramps, beaches, ferry services, cafes, wineries, golf clubs, parks, playgrounds, schools and more, you will love where you live!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
One Block From The Beach
Situated in a superb location less than 250m (approx.) walk to the foreshore and the St Leonards boat ramp, this home is ideally located with only one house separating it from The Esplanade and adjoining Port Phillip Bay. This large 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom home holds a prime position for beach lovers and avid fishermen!
The practical floor plan provides everything the family needs for a holiday weekender. The ground floor has one bedroom with built-in-robes, a combined bathroom/laundry and access to the two car garage.
The master bedroom is ideally located on the first floor next to the bathroom with the north-facing kitchen/living/dining positioned on the 1st floor. The kitchen offers gas cooking and a breakfast bar for serving quick snacks before hitting the beach. The enormous rear deck faces the beach with the main living hub opening onto this area making it an entertainers dream.
The interior has modern appeal with a cool white and neutral theme.
The easy-care garden is a blank canvas, ready for your ideas: why not add an alfresco, or that pool you've been talking about (STCA)? The DLUG has roller access to the rear of the block and the large double-carport also has access to the back of the block. Added to this, the property boasts side access offering an abundance of secure parking for vehicles and your boat.
With everything in place for a wonderful beach lifestyle, only 40 mins (approx.) from Geelong and around 90min from Melbourne, this light and lovely home is a 'must inspect'!

Address: 94 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
FHOG + Home Builders grant = $45,000
With the available grants from the government for building new, why would you consider any other option.
Property near the water with the best of views tends to be tightly held. Until now.......
Take advantage of the opportunity to secure a well-positioned, established 613m2 (approx.) allotment with incredible Northerly and Westerly views available from a 2nd storey at a fraction of the price of buying in a new estate.
Clifton Springs land with views is very affordable and is a well-kept secret on the Bellarine. The location of this block offers a short walk to the beach and family reserves at "The Dell" offering BBQ areas, rotundas and a magical setting on a private, child friendly beach.
The golf course, bistro & bowls club are also a short walk away.
A quick trip by car will deliver you to a number of the Peninsula's best attractions including award winning wineries, historical sites, great beaches, regular markets, annual events AND neighbours Queenscliff where you can jump on the ferry and enjoy a day trip on the Mornington Peninsula. And now with the ferry service from Portarlington to Melbourne, living on the Bellarine Peninsula has never been so convenient.
Call Dion today on 0424 940 629 to learn more.

Description:
2 Homes in 1 !
The Feel:
Explore the versatility offered by a property that can be configured as either one home with up to 5 beds/2 living, or dual occupancy with a main house plus fully self-contained living for extended family or Airbnb rental opportunity. Breathtaking panoramic views of Corio Bay & the You Yangs are enjoyed from the storybook master bedroom & new upper deck, with vantage points also from the ground floor. Vaulted ceilings, gas & wood fire heaters, ducted heating, plus SSAC add ultimate comfort to this home situated in tranquil pocket of Clifton Springs.
The Facts:
-Impressive character-filled home on 780sqm approx. elevated site overlooking world class vista
-Positioned to capture breathtaking views of Corio Bay, the You Yangs & surrounding countryside
-Ficus trees & jasmine herald your arrival, from a timber boardwalk to an expansive 360 verandah
-4-5BR residence + 3 bathrooms, study nook, 2 living/dining rooms, 2 kitchens & laundries
-Main kitchen features large countertops & Bosch double oven & Bosch dishwasher with Samsung cooktop
-Second kitchen has Kleenmaid electric wall oven, gas cooktop & ample storage
-Gas log fireplace with mantelpiece delivers lifestyle appeal to the formal living & dining zone
-Woodfire heater in family living room with sliding door to front deck
-High ceilings & timber flooring extend the sense of space
-Master bedroom with bay views from dorma windows, + ensuite & BIR
-Panoramic bay views from multiple bedrooms with upstairs offering versatile bed or 3rd living
-Shared access interconnected bathroom downstairs with bay views, shower, vanity & toilet
-Well-built home with thermal efficiency (roof insulated with lambs wool)
-Garden workshop + remote control double garaging with insulation & powder coated steel shelving
-Established garden with raised veggie boxes, citrus trees, 6,800L of rainwater for garden
-Additional features include: ducted heating/cooling, LED lights, ceiling fans & security alarm system
-Enjoy all that the Bellarine has to offer: wineries, farms, eateries, coffee shops, distilleries, breweries and fresh seafood/ produce!
-A few short minutes by car to Portarlington-Melbourne passenger Ferry
- Only 25 mins to Geelong and rail stations commuting to Melbourne
SELF CONTAINED UNIT comprises (if closed off from main house):
-Set up a games room/teenagers retreat, accommodate extra family, or Airbnb from this space!
-Private entry to carpeted living & dining room with gas log fire & ceiling fan
-Full size kitchen with bamboo flooring, Kleenmaid electric wall oven, gas cooktop & ample storage
-Bathroom with new shower screen & tapware, plus separate toilet
-2 bedrooms (1 downstairs with BIR, 1 upstairs with storybook character, bay views, en suite & BIR)
The Owner Loves.
We have always loved watching the ships sail by from our bedroom, & the upper deck allows us to share the incredible bay views with friends its glorious at sunset. This home offers us the flexibility of using it in its entirety, or closing off the south end for fully self-sufficient stays.

Description:
Brand New in Bayview!
The Feel:
Your brand-new home awaits, just moments from Curlewis best amenities! Presenting an easy-care 3-bed residence, this home is perfect for first home buyers taking advantage of generous government incentives or any investors/downsizers looking for their next savvy purchase. North orientation invites loads of natural light into the open plan living, dining & kitchen, with direct access to a private backyard. Enjoy the convenience of being located less than a minute from the new Curlewis Shopping Centre, with the local Primary School & parks also nearby.
The Facts:
-Brand new 3BR home set in the desirable Bayview Estate
-100m to Bayview Central, 600m to Clifton Springs Primary School
-10 min walk to stunning bayside beaches via Griggs Creek trail
-Undercover front patio with a welcoming & private entry
-S/S Westinghouse 900mm electric oven, gas cooktop & rangehood + walk-in pantry
-OP living & social dining space enjoy abundant natural light due to northern aspect
-Affordable first home/downsize option or portfolio addition
-Master BR at façade with WIR & modern en suite with shower
-Family bathroom with deep inset bathtub, shower, vanity & separate WC
-Low maintenance floating floorboards to high traffic areas, carpet to bedrooms
-SLUG with internal & rear utility access
-Ducted heating & ceiling fans
-Landscaped areas ready for gardens to complete the outdoor spaces
-Quick access to existing Marketplace Shops & Bayview Central
-Established family friendly estate. 5 to Drysdale CBD, 25 to Geelong
The Owner Loves.
Its a really central position in the estate, close to parks and playgrounds, with the convenience of the new Curlewis Shopping Centre across the road.

Description:
Award Winning!
Having won a HIA award for the best renovation in Victoria, this stunning residence simply has to been seen to be believed. Originally the St Leonard's Post Office, the property has been transformed into a unique abode that resonates modern coastal living and is a brilliant merge of old and new.
Stepping through the front door the home immediately gives you a sense of light and space. The floorplan is incredibly versatile, featuring four bedrooms plus study. The master retreat is a beautiful room with an adjoining ensuite featuring stone vanity and modernist shower. A large WIR completes this stunning room.
The kitchen/living area is a wondrous space with soaring ceiling heights, ample natural light and a seamless merge to the rear deck with stunning garden views to the mature mulberry tree.
The kitchen is amazing not only in the quality of the appliances but also in terms of its functional design. Hardwood island bench and spacious butler's pantry make this a place to prepare food or entertain. Appliances include: 700mm oven, gas cook-top, microwave convection combination, coffee machine, Vintec wine fridge, beverage fridge and dishwasher.
A separate lounge/theatre room features Harman surround sound system. This is a great chill-out space, child's play area or movie room.
Ducted heating and cooling ensure the property is maintained at the perfect temperature regardless of season.
A 5kW solar system and a 22,000lt water tank which is connected to the house, combine to make this an energy efficient home.
Located only metres from the St Leonards shopping hub and beach, this visionary home offers a lifestyle like no other. 1350 Murradoc Road, St Leonards awaits a winning offer!

Description:
Lot 569 Meredith Avenue, Seachange Estate
With lots ranging from 300sqm to over 500sqm and with frontages from 12m to 16m (and everything in between) there really is something to suit everyone's lifestyle and budget.
The quality of the previous stages is available for all to see with the landscaping themes to be continued into the next stages. Of particular note will be the palm tree lined dual carriage way entry boulevard as well as over 5 acres of wetland reserve available for passive recreation.
Less than 90 minutes from Melbourne and 30 minutes from Geelong 'Seachange' represents outstanding value for money and is no doubt why it is selling so quickly.
- Over 500 Lots sold in only 14 months
- Walk to the beach
- 1 hectare reserve with multi-aged playground, pavilion, soccer goal & half basketball court.

Description:
Plenty Of Space For The Growing Family
Presenting spacious family living in a peaceful pocket of Curlewis, youll need to act swiftly to secure this carefree lifestyle.
With the Morris Street playground footsteps from your front door, you wont have to venture far to enjoy some outdoor family fun. Public transport is also within walking distance, along with the Bay View Shopping Centre and Drysdale Recreation Reserve. Clifton Springs P.S. is moments away, while both Bellarine Secondary College and St Ignatius College are within close reach. Enjoy easy access to the Clifton Springs boat ramp, Curlewis Golf Club and the regions finest wineries.
Zoned to the front of the home, the lounge creates a generous spot to pop up your feet and unwind. With the spacious open plan living/dining/kitchen zone flowing onto the sheltered alfresco, youll never have to worry about running out of room again. The kitchen will impress with stone benchtops, a walk-in pantry, and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher and 900mm oven, gas cooktop and rangehood). The impressive island bench conveniently doubles as a breakfast bar for casual dining.
The Master Bedroom provides a quiet retreat for parents with a walk-in robe and en suite with large shower. Three additional bedrooms with mirrored built-in robes are tucked away in a separate wing, along with the main bathroom and separate toilet. The laundry boasts storage and external access, while an abundance of storage is featured throughout the home. Youll be in comfort all year long thanks to ducted heating and a split-system air conditioner. Easy care gardens line the secure backyard, which wraps around the northern side of the home. The remote double lock-up garage features internal access, plus a rear roller door that provides backyard vehicle access perfect for storing caravans, boats, or trailers.

Description:
Ultimate Luxury in Coastal Living
Encompassing striking architectural design, a luxurious sense of space and superb attention to quality and detail, this sensational family home is perfectly positioned for year round indoor-outdoor enjoyment just minutes from the front beach and popular cafe strip.
Beautifully appointed, this property is designed to impress, with the spacious floor plan flowing effortlessly across two levels cleverly combining functionality with a sense of sumptuousness. Multiple living zones offer wonderful flexibility and space for the whole family to enjoy, including the spacious alfresco front deck, complete with plunge pool, and BBQ, surrounded by glorious kangaroo paws and gabion walls.
The accommodation is flexible and abundant with three bedrooms downstairs, including a sleek family bathroom with floor to wall tiling and temperature controlled shower with LED lighting. Upstairs, 2 further bedrooms plus study/ 6th bedroom, the master suite with extensive walk in wardrobe and luxurious ensuite with Italian vanity unit and walk in double shower.
Brimming with natural light and sea breezes, the second floor features a generous living and dining domain, complemented by a superb gourmet kitchen complete with huge caesar stone island bench, butlers pantry, wine fridge and oversized oven with glass splashback.
Premium inclusions are showcased throughout the property, including blackbutt flooring, video intercom, security CCTV system, spacious laundry, powder room, ground-floor kitchenette, extensive decking with sensor lighting, solar panels and a double covered carport. An attractive landscaped rear garden incorporating Castlemaine stone paving and feature rocks completes the setting. In this coveted location, 200 metres to the beach and close to all the coastal assets of the Bellarine Peninsula, this home will appeal to those seeking a quality and luxurious lifestyle.
